thread.title: PPI-Time Zero Approved As Subcontractor on U.S. Navy Seaport-e Contract Vehicle
thread.title_full: PPI-Time Zero Approved As Subcontractor on U.S. Navy Seaport-e Contract Vehicle

author: Joe Litavis
title: PPI-Time Zero Approved As Subcontractor on U.S. Navy Seaport-e Contract Vehicle
text:
PPI-Time Zero is pleased to announce that they have been approved on SeaPort Enhanced (Seaport-e) as a subcontractor under Quest Knight Enterprises, a leading provider of systems engineering for unmanned/robotic systems. SeaPort-e is the Navy’s electronic platform for acquiring support services in 22 functional areas including Engineering, Financial Management, and Program Management. The Navy Systems Commands (NAVSEA, NAVAIR, SPAWAR, NAVFAC, and NAVSUP), the Office of Naval Research, the United States Marine Corps, and the Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA) compete their service requirements amongst Seaport-e IDIQ multiple award contract holders. "We were very excited when Quest Knight Enterprises approached us about becoming a part of their SeaPort-e team," said Dana Pittman, President and CEO of PPI-Time Zero. "Nearly 85% of SeaPort-e approved contractors are small businesses, and we saw this as a tremendous opportunity to create long term business success with QKE and their affiliates.” The SeaPort-e online procurement portal provides a standardized, efficient means of soliciting offers from among the diverse population of large and small businesses and their approved team members. For more information on the Navy SeaPort-e Multiple Awards Contracts program, visit http://www.seaport.navy.mil/
Contract # N00178-10-R-6265
Our Seaport-e contract covers: Research and Development Services, Systems Engineering, Modeling and Simulation, Prototyping, Systems Design, and Program Support in all seven zones.
Zone 1 - Northeast Zone
Zone 2 - National Capital Zone
Zone 3 - Mid Atlantic Zone
Zone 4 - Gulf Coast Zone
Zone 5 - Midwest Zone
Zone 6 - Southwest Zone
Zone 7 - Northwest Zone
PPI-Time Zero is an EMS provider of printed circuit board (PCB) layout, assembly, test and integration services which support the Military, Aerospace, Medical, and Industrial markets. Please visit our website at http://www.ppi-timezero.com
